de: Haben Sie Lust auf Natur, eine Terrasse bei schönem Wetter, authentische Gerichte oder im Winter auf einen romantischen Moment am Kamin? Wir empfangen Sie in einer sanften und farbenfrohen Atmosphäre im Stil eines Gästehauses.
en:
he pleasure of a good restaurant a few steps from Lyon

Do you want nature, a terrace in fine weather, authentic flavors or a romantic moment by the fireplace in winter? La Source dorée welcomes you as in a family home, in a soft and colorful atmosphere, in a guest house spirit.

We welcome you to our home, in our living room or on the terrace. We are fond of meetings and life stories, which in particular guide our choice of partnerships.
Healthy and organic cuisine, local and quality products

Jérôme Munster, our partner and gourmet cook, offers healthy and delicious cuisine that appeals to all the senses. Every day, he goes above and beyond to offer you new menus highlighting the quality products that we select for you.

All our products are of local origin, from small organic farms that we like to promote and share with our guests.

We hope that you will soon meet in our charming restaurant for a timeless moment, like a parenthesis.
A unique break in the heart of the lyonnais mountains, combining the beauty of nature and the architectural heritage

Do not hesitate to come and spend a moment in the heart of the beauty of the mountains and hillsides of western Lyon.

You can also visit our permacole farm and its natural park or take a walk .
it: Siete alla ricerca di natura, di una terrazza nelle giornate di sole, di sapori autentici o di un momento romantico accanto al fuoco in inverno? Vi accogliamo in un'atmosfera soft e colorata, in pieno spirito guest house.
fr: Vous avez envie de nature, d’une terrasse aux beaux jours, de saveurs authentiques ou encore d’un moment romantique au coin du feu en hiver ? Nous vous accueillons dans une ambiance douce et colorée, dans un esprit maison d’hôtes.
es: ¿Busca la naturaleza, una terraza en días soleados, sabores auténticos o un momento romántico junto al fuego en invierno? Le damos la bienvenida en un ambiente suave y colorido, con espíritu de casa de huéspedes.
nl: Bent u op zoek naar natuur, een terras op zonnige dagen, authentieke smaken of een romantisch moment bij het vuur in de winter? Wij ontvangen u in een zachte en kleurrijke sfeer, in de geest van een pension.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme du Pays de l'Arbresle

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:legalName: Apidae Tourisme Scic SA - source : Apidae Tourisme
